sentences.en: a book of extraordinary gravitas
sentences.cn: 一本非常严肃的书

sentences.en: a woman of extraordinary beauty
sentences.cn: 容貌出众的女子

sentences.en: an extraordinary talent
sentences.cn: 非凡的才华

sentences.en: By any standards, the accomplishments of the past year are extraordinary.
sentences.cn: 不管以哪种标准来衡量，过去一年都成果斐然。

sentences.en: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
sentences.cn: 人生就应该是快乐的，要抓住每一天，孩子们，让你们的生活变得非凡起来。

sentences.en: Edwin H. Conger was envoy extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary.
sentences.cn: 埃德温·H.康格是特命全权公使。

sentences.en: Gill had an extraordinary, incandescent personality.
sentences.cn: 吉尔个性鲜明，热情洋溢。

sentences.en: He is possessed of an extraordinary fund of energy.
sentences.cn: 他的精力异常充沛。

sentences.en: Her obliviousness of what was happening in Germany seems extraordinary.
sentences.cn: 真没想到她对德国正在发生的事情居然一无所知。

sentences.en: His behaviour was extraordinary and inexplicable.
sentences.cn: 他的行为不同寻常，让人费解。

sentences.en: His writings were marked by an extraordinary lucidity and elegance of style.
sentences.cn: 他的作品简洁明晰，文风典雅。

sentences.en: It took an extraordinary amount of work.
sentences.cn: 这费了相当多的功夫。

sentences.en: It's extraordinary that he managed to sleep through the party.
sentences.cn: 真想不到他竟然从聚会开始一直睡到结束。

sentences.en: It’s extraordinary that he should make exactly the same mistake again.
sentences.cn: 真想不到他又犯了完全相同的错误。

sentences.en: Rozhdestvensky is an extraordinary musician.
sentences.cn: 罗日杰斯特文斯基是位出色的音乐家。

sentences.en: She was a woman with extraordinary vibrancy and extraordinary knowledge.
sentences.cn: 她是一位充满活力、博学多识的女子。

sentences.en: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.--Jimmy Johnson
sentences.cn: 平凡与非凡的差异仅在于那一点点额外的努力。

sentences.en: The U.S. has called for an extraordinary emergency meeting of the UN Human Rights Commission to examine the crisis.
sentences.cn: 美国已要求召开一次联合国人权委员特别紧急会议来调查这次危机。

sentences.en: There's an extraordinary amount of power vested in us.
sentences.cn: 我们被授予了巨大的权力。

sentences.en: What an extraordinary thing to happen!
sentences.cn: 这事儿真蹊跷！

phrases.tran_cn: 特别会员大会；非常股东大会

trans.tran_cn: 非凡的，非常奇特的，特别的
trans.tran_en: very much greater or more impressive than usual
